# Visualization Functions

```{r}
anxiety_long <-pivot_longer(anxiety_sub, cols=1:4, names_to = "Variable", values_to = "Response") 
anxiety_long$Response <- factor(anxiety_long$Response)
anxiety_long$Variable <- factor(anxiety_long$Variable)
anxiety_long %>% 
  group_by(Variable,Response) %>% 
  dplyr::summarize(n=n()) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x= Variable, y= n, group = Response))+
  geom_line(aes(col=Response),size=1) +
  theme_minimal()+coord_cartesian(xlim =c(1.5, 3.5))+
  labs(x="Variable", y= "Count of Response", Title = "How Question Response Changes Over Multiple Waves")
```





```{r}
anxiety_sub %>%
  keep(is.numeric) %>% 
  gather() %>% 
  ggplot(aes(value)) +
    facet_wrap(~ key, scales = "free") +
    geom_histogram()
```
